summary: Give you more ways to grow your skills!
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=red][b]Attention[/b][/color]
If you acted update from Skyrim ver 1.8 to 1.9,please install this mod again.
Some scripts will be overwritten when you update.
Enjoy my mod![/size]

[size=6][color=Springgreen]-Description-[/color][/size]

[size=4]Haven\'t you think that making ingots should grow smithing skill ?
This mod gives you more chance to grow your skill!
[/size]
[size=5]Using tanning rack Mining ore grows your [color=Seagreen]Smithing[/color] skill!
And if you mine gems,more grows!

Cooking foods grows your [color=Aqua]Alchemy[/color] skill!

Chopping woods grows your [color=Orange]One-Handed[/color] skill!

Trapping soul grows your [color=Magenta]Enchanting[/color] and [color=Dodgerblue]Conjuration[/color] skill!
And the amount of growing skill [color=Goldenrod]depends on target\'s type![/color]
ex) If you trap human\'s soul,the skills grows much than animals and skeletons.
Besides,you learn some features from trapped souls.
So you can get some extra bonus depending on enemy\'s race!


--Humans--
[color=Dodgerblue]Nord[/color]:increase your [color=Lightsteelblue]frost resist by 0.75 %[/color] and heavy armor skill
[color=Coral]Breton[/color]:increase your [color=Lightsteelblue]magic resist by 0.8 %[/color] and restoration skill
[color=Gold]Imperial[/color]:increase your speechcraft and block skill
[color=Orange]Redguard[/color]:increase your [color=Greenyellow]stamina regeneration[/color] by 10%  and one-handed skill

--Elves--
[color=Gold]High Elf[/color]:increase your [color=Cyan]magicka by 2.5 point[/color] and alteration skill
[color=Greenyellow]Wood Elf[/color]:increase your [color=Mediumpurple]poison resist by 2%[/color] and archery skill
[color=Magenta]Dark Elf[/color]:increase your [color=Red]fire resist by 1%[/color] and illusion skill
[color=Mediumturquoise]Falmer[/color]:increase your [color=Cyan]magicka by 0.2 point[/color] less than High Elf,and destruction skill
[color=Forestgreen]Orc[/color]:increase your [color=Greenyellow]stamina by 1 point[/color] and smithing skill

--DemiHumans--
[color=Green]Argonian[/color]:increase your sneak and lockpicking skill
[color=Chocolate]Khajiit[/color]:increase your sneak and pickpocket skill

~~Creatures~~
[color=Mediumslateblue]Dragon Priest[/color]:decrease your [color=Lightskyblue]shout recharging time by 5%[/color]
[color=Red]Alduin[/color]:decrease your [color=Lightskyblue]shout recharging time by 50%[/color]
[color=Red]Dremora[/color]:increase your [color=Dodgerblue]conjuration skill so much[/color]


These status bonuses are not effects,just modify your status.
So they last permanently,and [color=Orange]the more increase your status the more you kill enemies of the race.[/color]

[color=Salmon]And more, you can trap dragon\'s soul![/color](unlike \"Dragon Soul\" to unlock shout)
[color=Aquamarine]Of course their souls grow your skill more than tiny human\'s![/color][/size]


[size=6]--[color=Chartreuse]Alchemist\'s Magic Cauldron[/color]--[/size]
[size=5]You can make weapons,armors,and ingots in this cauldron,[color=Chartreuse]by your alchemy skill[/color]!
Now I set them at some locations,please read txt file in this mod.(ex:Dragonsreach,Sleeping Giant,etc...)[/size]

[size=6]--[color=Mediumorchid]Enchanter\'s Soul Gem Creater[/color]--[/size]
[size=5]You can make soul gems [color=Mediumorchid]by your enchanting skill[/color]!
And you often get [color=Violet]\"Black soul gem fragment\"[/color] when you mine ore.
You can make [color=Magenta]a black soul gem from 10 fragments[/color].
Same as cauldron,I set it at some locations.check txt file in this mod.
[/size]

[size=4]In addition, there are some optional files,check them!
[color=red]If you have any bugs about this mod,please report it in forum.[/color][/size]

[size=6][color=Cadetblue]This mod gives more meaning to your life in Skyrim![/color]
[/size]
author: metametroid

files.name: More EXP Chance
files.changelogHtml:
Now trapping target's soul grows your Enchanting skill
Amount of growing skill is overall increased

files.name: More EXP Chance
files.changelogHtml:
Trapping soul grows your enchanting and conjuration skill
The amount of their skill growing depends on target' type
Now you can trap dragon's soul
